response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This opportunity is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also securing a significant discount. I believe this investment will greatly benefit you and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
